Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2008 09:41PM boatergirl wrote:  Yes I am having an ultrasound guided needle bx tomorrow. What were the results od your bx. I am a nuirse and like to be in control. It is the not having enough info that is driving me crazy.I found this site through my dear friend who was diagnosed over a year ago.
Posts.Title: hypoechoic,taller than wider boatergirl TenderIsOurMight

Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2008 09:58PM boatergirl wrote: Really appreciate your taking time to respond. The radiologist told me 80% were benign, and I was feeling pretty good about things until reading up on ultrasound findings. I am still trying to be optomistic, but I will feel better knowing what the answers are no matter what. I hope you are doing well. My freind is having her other breast removed in Dec. prophloactically because she is afraid of developing cancer in that breast. She is doing well, but I worry because she had some + nodes. Thanks again for responding. I hope you are doing well
